title: Braums jump
body: Does anyone know if{{champion:201}} can use his jump to attach on a tp or recalling person?

replies.body: you'll go to their position rather than join them on an adventure. At least that's how it seems to work every time I try.

There are a few odd exceptions to this but they are very rare and unlikely to happen, even if you KNOW them you are incredibly unlikely to time it properly to bother trying to learn them. The window for the ones I have seen is about 0.1 second, so it is purely luck based at that point, as you are interacting with a champ at the exact right moment they interact with a transporting ability.
It would be so cool but who knows maybe with perfect timing, such as with ekko how u can b the ult back to lane.
